name: bitmagnet
tagline: A torrent metadata indexer and DHT crawler for search and analysis
description: BitMagnet is an open-source torrent metadata indexer and DHT crawler that collects and structures BitTorrent data. It includes a web UI for browsing and analyzing torrent metadata, with an option to self-host and extend via API.

features.title: Torrent Indexing
features.description: Indexes and catalogs torrent metadata

features.title: Metadata Extraction
features.description: Extracts file and media information from torrents

features.title: Search Interface
features.description: Searches indexed torrents by name and attributes

features.title: API Access
features.description: Exposes indexed data through APIs

features.title: Deduplication
features.description: Identifies duplicate torrents and files

features.title: Database Storage
features.description: Stores indexed data in a structured database

features.title: Self-Hosted Index
features.description: Runs as a private torrent metadata service

features.title: Torrent Metadata Indexing
features.description: Indexes torrent metadata into a searchable database

features.title: Distributed Metadata Crawling
features.description: Collects metadata from multiple torrent sources

features.title: Advanced Search
features.description: Searches torrents by name, size, category, and attributes

features.title: API Access
features.description: Exposes indexed torrent data through HTTP APIs

features.title: Duplicate Detection
features.description: Identifies duplicate torrents and overlapping content

features.title: Structured Database Storage
features.description: Stores torrent metadata in a normalized database

features.title: Media Metadata Extraction
features.description: Extracts media-related information from torrent contents

features.title: Self-Hosted Index
features.description: Runs as a private torrent metadata service
